title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Natural Heritage
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Natural Heritage             Natural Heritage         Wrangell-St. Elias National Park and Preserve is more than a national park.Â  It is also the United State's largest designated Wilderness Area and is part of the second largest international U.N. World Heritage Site.    Wilderness Area Wrangell-St. Elias Wilderness Area    World Heritage Site Kluane /Wrangell-St. Elias /Glacier Bay /Tatshenshini-Alsek World Heritage Site
